name: GKChallenge
desc: A challenge issued by the local player to another player.

items.name: class func loadReceivedChallenges(completionHandler: (([GKChallenge]?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads the list of outstanding challenges.

items.name: var issuingPlayer: GKPlayer?
items.desc: The player who issues the challenge.

items.name: var receivingPlayer: GKPlayer?
items.desc: The player who receives the challenge.

items.name: var message: String?
items.desc: A text message that describes the challenge.

items.name: var state: GKChallengeState
items.desc: The current state of the challenge.

items.name: var issueDate: Date
items.desc: The date the player issued the challenge.

items.name: var completionDate: Date?
items.desc: The date the challenged player completed the challenge.

items.name: func decline()
items.desc: Declines a challenge that another player issues to the local player.

items.name: typealias GKChallengeComposeCompletionBlock
items.desc: A completion block that provides information about the player who issues a challenge and the players who receive it.
